text: Joe Dixon (born 31 May 1940) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Fitzroy in the Victorian Football League (VFL). Dixon's son Ben Dixon played for Hawthorn Football Club. == Notes == == External links == * * Category:Living people Category:1940 births Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Fitzroy Football Club players Category:Yarrawonga Football Club players
title: Joe Dixon (Australian footballer)
